original_title: Xana and Dax: When Opposites Attract
overview: Xana is blonde, blue-eyed, and buxom.  Dax is dark and lean.  She's an experienced woman who knows what she likes; he's young and eager to learn.  Now you can get to know this exuberant husband and wife in a uniquely intimate way.  "Xana and Dax: When Opposites Attract" has a feeling of openness, expansiveness.  There's no doubt that Xana and Dax are putting on a show for each other (they say as much) but they're also putting on a show for us; and in both cases it's clearly a performance they're thrilled to be giving.  They're utterly unabashed in the carnality of their love for each other, and eager to share that love with us.
title: Xana and Dax: When Opposites Attract
